Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees enter this series on the back of a tough stretch, having lost the first series they played in two weeks.
The Yankees have found themselves at the receiving end of the Red Sox’s dominance, with a paltry 1-8 record against them in 2023.
For the Yankees, Fenway Park has often been a house of horrors.
The Yankees’ strength in 2023 lies in their pitching, ranking third in the league with a.233 batting average against (BAA) and a respectable 3.99 ERA.
The Red Sox have thrived offensively, boasting a.264 batting average (3rd),.329 on-base percentage (7th),.437 slugging percentage (6th), and a.766 OPS.
Playoff Implications: As the Yankees continue to chase the Red Sox in the AL East, this series carries immense significance.
Every win down the stretch becomes crucial in their quest for a playoff berth.
Pitching Matchups: Game 1: Clarke Schmidt vs Kutter Crawford
Game 2: Carlos Rodón vs Nick Pivetta
